titleNullable: Animals with skelet key points and action mark
descriptionNullable:
### Context
This dataset can be used to solve the problem of animal behavior recognition based on its image.

### Content

For each of the 967 animal images (6 types of animals), three sets of key points of the skeleton (20 different positions) can be found, as well as a mark about the action class.

### Acknowledgements

This dataset is the result of using the developed augmentation methods 

(described in the article AD Egorov and MS Reznik, "Selection of Hyperparameters and Data Augmentation Method for Diverse Backbone Models Mask R-CNN," 2021 IV International Conference on Control in Technical Systems (CTS), 2021 , pp. 249-251, doi: 10.1109/CTS53513.2021.9562845.) 

to the dataset from 

Cao J. et al. Cross-domain adaptation for animal pose estimation // Proceedings of the IEEE/CVF International Conference on Computer Vision. - 2019. - S. 9498-9507.

Dataset is created in National Research Nuclear University and Samsung IT Academy AI course.

### Inspiration

Your data will be in front of the world's largest data science community. What questions do you want to see answered?
